channel.title: BEA Joins Eclipse
channel.description: Interesting news from Javaworld. BEA are to announce that they are to join the Eclipse foundation. Hopefully this signals that Weblogic Workshop will be integrated with Eclipse (just as IBM integrate at the moment for WSAD). This only leave Sun...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Ben+00:00
item.description: Thank bejesus for that - workshop is a crock! :-D
item.dc:creator: Ben
